name: Create or Destroy Water
flavorText: Conjure a sudden bloom of life-giving moisture or wither it away. You create a gush of fresh water that fills a 5â€‘foot square or you desiccate the same area, draining moisture from soil, plants, or small pools.
description:
You either create or destroy water.

Create Water: You create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range in an open container. Alternatively, the water falls as rain in a 30-foot cube within range, extinguishing exposed flames in the area.

Destroy Water: You destroy up to 10 gallons of water in an open container within range. Alternatively, you destroy fog in a 30-foot cube within range.
components: V, S, M (a drop of water if creating water, or a few grains of sand if destroying it)

materialsNeeded: a drop of water if creating water, or a few grains of sand if destroying it

higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you create or destroy 10 additional gallons of water, or the size of the cube increases by 5 feet, for each slot level above 1st.
